title: Embroidered Picture, 1980-38-7, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk and metallic thread on a silk foundation
Technique: embroidered
description: Picture showing a stag resting on a hillock surrounded by oversized vegetation such a tulip, an oak three with acorns, a strawberry plant and other flowers. The scene also inlcudes a large parrot on a branch, a butterfly and other insects.
